thread.title: Customer

author: Customer
title: Customer
text: Very straight forward, ordered the tyres on Wednesday and requested a 2 hour fitting time slot the following Saturday. Was allocated 11-1. Mobile driver (Sean) contacted me half an hour before arriving at 11. Extremely polite. 2 tyres fitted within half an hour. This is the third time I've used tyres on the drive and I have had no complaints on each occasion. Definitely beats the bad old of days of turning up at the garage to be ignored by a group of mechanics covered in oil! Thanks very much, would recommend to anyone. Convenient and competitively priced.
